hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the hare has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Leporine Leaps
entries: The hare's long jump is up to 20 feet and their high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Kick (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Backkick (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hare makes a signature attack against a creature that is Medium or smaller. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and both the hare and the target are pushed up to 5 feet away from each other. The target must also succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Ricochet Rabbit (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hare makes a signature attack against up to PB creatures as it leaps between them without provoking opportunity attacks. The first creature must be within 5 feet of the hare, and each subsequent creature must be within 20 feet of the previous creature attacked. The hare then ends this action within 5 feet of the final creature attacked.

bonus.name: 1st Level: Bunny Hop (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hare jumps up to twice its jump distance without triggering opportunity attacks.

variant.name: Mystic Connection
entries: As a bonus action, you can leap up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once), regaining all uses when you finish a long rest.

hp.special: 7 + 7 times caregiver's level (the jackalope has a number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Leporine Leaps
entries: The jackalope's long jump is up to 20 feet and their high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The jackalope can mimic the sounds of voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 + PB Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Antlers (Signature Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3+PB|+3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, {@h} {@damage 1d6+PB|1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Ventriloquy (5 Ferocity)
entries: The jackalope uses its Mimicry trait and can make the sound appear to originate from a point it chooses within 30 feet. The jackalope can also choose a creature that hears the voice, that creature must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Wisdom saving throw or become @{condition distracted:J:general} until the end of the jackalope's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Trickster's Voice (8 Ferocity)
entries: The jackalope chooses up to PB creatures it can see within 30 feet and that can hear the jackalope. Each creature must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the jackalope until the end of the jackalope's next turn. The jackalope and its caregiver have advantage on attack rolls against a creature charmed in this way. If a creature charmed in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends on that creature.

bonus.name: 1st Level: Bunny Hop (2 Ferocity)
entries: The jackalope jumps up to twice its jump distance without triggering opportunity attacks.

variant.name: Mystic Connection
entries: You have advantage on Charisma checks to disguise your voice. In addition, you can use a bonus action to make you voice appear to originate from a point you choose within 30 feet. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once), regaining all uses when you finish a long rest.
